testcase.name: Device Orientation
testcase.summary: Check Template in different device Orientation.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the App.

2. Initialise the app

step.actions:
1. Play the Ad in Flex feed.

2. Change device orientation Portrait/Landscape mode.
step.expectedresults: Template should display correctly in both the orientation.

testcase.name: Device Volume
testcase.summary: Check device volume when mute/unmute Ad play on APP
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Put device volume 0 befor starting  vungle App
2)Open app tap on Start with mute option and play the ad.
3)After playing ad and close end card
4)Come back on App.
5)Try increase / decrease the media volume
step.expectedresults: While playing Ad media volume of device should changable.

testcase.name: Lock/unlock device
testcase.summary: Lock/unlock device
testcase.preconditions:
1.Install the App.

â€‹2.Initialise the App

step.actions:
1.Load rewarded placement ID.

2.Play the ad.

3. Lock/Unlock device
4. Observe template behaviour
step.expectedresults:
1. Ad should get paused when device is locked and ad should get resumed when unlocked device.

2.Black screen should not display video assets should display correctly.

testcase.name: Airplane mode
testcase.summary: Ad play after airplane mode
testcase.preconditions: Ad should be loaded

step.actions:
1) Initialise app 
2) Load ad
3) Play ad
4) Turn on airplane/ flight mode
5) Turn off airplane mode and enable wifi
6) Observe template behaviour
step.expectedresults:
1) Template should behave correctly.
2) Video and End card should behave correctly.

testcase.name: Template functionality when put the app in background/foreground.
testcase.summary: Check the functionality of template when the app in background/foreground.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set Charles proxy.
  2. Initialise the App

step.actions:
1) Start Test app Init SDK and play an ad

2)Send app to the background for 5 minutes

3)Play video and send to background. While playing the video, swipe down notifications, video should pause. Swipe back notifications, the video should now resume. Android: When the device's lock screen is set to none(Settings->Security->Screen lock none on Android devices), play video, off/lock the device, on/unlock the device again, the video should resume after the device is unlocked
step.expectedresults: Template should work correctly.

testcase.name: Response payload of Ads API
testcase.summary: To check response payload of Ads API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on Android/iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter valid Placement id.
3)Manually initialize the SDK.
4)Observe template type parameter in ads response
step.expectedresults: Template type parameter should contain correct value.(Ex. "template_type": "feedview")

testcase.name: TPAT gesture
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT gesture in report Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Open end card and tap on any button of endcard .

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.

5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: When a user touch any part of the end-card In reportAd, should see the gesture information attached to "action."

testcase.name: TPAT notification
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT notification in charles
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the full Ad.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play full Ad.

4)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: Should see "tpat" attribute that send checkpoint 1, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75

testcase.name: Close button
testcase.summary: Observe the close button should not display on video
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad unit have close button on video.

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad with back button
testcase.summary: Check incentivized Ad with back button
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on device back button
4)When Incentivized popup appears on screen, tap on back button of device.
step.expectedresults:
1)When Incentivized popup appears on screen, Ad should pauses.

2)Tap on Back button of device, popup should close, Ad should resumes.

testcase.name: Observe for reportAd
testcase.summary: Observe the report Ad
testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.
2)Start the App.
3)Initialize and Play the Ad.
4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.
5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. All parameters in request payload of report Ad should display correct value.
For example - “Ad duration” parameter in reportAd:- when Ad play and Ad experience close by user reportAd is created , In reportAd this parameter show the total value of time duration of Ads.

testcase.name: App Icon
testcase.summary: Observe App Icon
testcase.preconditions: Set "APP_ICON" parameter value as :"http://cdn-lb.vungle.com/templates/defaults/img/app-icon.svg" in request ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Open end card .
4)Observe App icon on end card
step.expectedresults:
Should display app icon that is set by App _ICON token
App icon should display on overlay of video.

testcase.name: Screen Resolution
testcase.summary: Observe Screen resolution of different device
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad on different device which having small, medium and larger resolution screen

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)
For medium devices:- >=360px (majority of recent mobile devices such as iPhone 6/6S, Galaxy S5, HTC One)
For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

testcase.name: Verify position of the mute/unmute button
testcase.summary: Mute/Un-mute on Video
testcase.preconditions: Set up Charles & video, App icon, Ratings,CTA App Name values

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe position of mute/unmute icon
step.expectedresults:
The mute icon positioning should remain within the video container to give user context as to what audio source is being muted/unmuted.
The icon should be placed as per the set value for both video type (16:9 & 9:16)

testcase.name: verify mute/unmute video functionality
testcase.summary: Mute/Un-mute on Video
testcase.preconditions: Set up Charles & video, App icon, Ratings,CTA App Name values

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template format
step.expectedresults:
When the ad unit is loaded into view, it should display the icon based on the publisher token.
The icon remains should be visible for 4 seconds and then fade.
If the user taps on the video, the icon should reappears.
User should be able to toggle the audio by pressing the icon. After the interaction, icon should fade after 4 secs of inactivity

  2. Initialise the App

step.actions:
1) Start Test app Init SDK and play an ad

2)Send app to the background for 5 minutes

3)Play video and send to background. While playing the video, swipe down notifications, video should pause. Swipe back notifications, the video should now resume. Android: When the device's lock screen is set to none(Settings->Security->Screen lock none on Android devices), play video, off/lock the device, on/unlock the device again, the video should resume after the device is unlocked
step.expectedresults: Template should work correctly.

testcase.name: video display
testcase.summary: Check  video when VIDEO_CROP token is set to true/false when user makes creative with Native ad - Cinematic template.
testcase.preconditions: Set VIDEO_CROP  token as false/true.

step.actions:
1.Start the App. 
2.Initialise and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
*1. VIDEO_CROP token is set to true-
 
For Responsive Video containers-
1.Crop video should be displayed in 4:3 ratio.
2.Square videos should never be cropped, irrespective of whether the VIDEO_CROP token value is true or false: 
 
For Medium breakpoint (portrait)-
1.Horizontal video should automatically fills the container and is then cropped on the left and right up to 4:3 of the video width.
2.Square video should scale to fit inside the app container. In mobile portrait, any blank edges should only appear on the right-hand side.
 
For Medium breakpoint (landscape)-
1.Horizontal video should automatically fills the container and is then cropped on the left and right up to 4:3 of the video width.
2.Square video should scale to fit inside the app container. In mobile portrait, any blank edges should only appear on the right-hand side.
 
*2. VIDEO_CROP token is set to false-
 
For Responsive Video containers-
1.User should not be able to crop the video.
2.Video should be displayed in 16:9 ratio.
 
For Medium breakpoint (portrait)-
1.Video should display appropriately.
 
For Medium breakpoint (landscape)-
1.Video should display appropriately.

testcase.name: verify mute/unmute video functionality
testcase.summary: Mute/Un-mute on Video
testcase.preconditions: Set up Charles & video, App icon, Ratings,CTA App Name values

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template format
step.expectedresults:
When the ad unit is loaded into view, it should display the icon based on the publisher token.
The icon remains should be visible for 4 seconds and then fade.
If the user taps on the video, the icon should reappears.
User should be able to toggle the audio by pressing the icon. After the interaction, icon should fade after 4 secs of inactivity

4)Observe position of mute/unmute icon
step.expectedresults:

testcase.name: To verify the default value of token "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN"
testcase.summary: To verify the default value of token "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN"
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Set a Charles Proxy.

2. Load and Play Ad.

3. Observe the Charles for default value of 'SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN'.
step.expectedresults:
1. Default value for this token should be "Delayed".

2. There can be 6 different values for this token i.e. start, delayed, end, onClick, alwaysvisible & Hidden .

testcase.name: To verify "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" with value "Start/Delayed/End/onClick/Hidden/alwaysVisible".
testcase.summary: To verify "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" with value "Start/Delayed/End/onClick/Hidden/alwaysVisible".
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Set a charles Proxy.

2. Manipulate the "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" with different value as "Start/Delayed/End/onClick/Hidden/alwaysVisible" in response payload of Ads.

3. Laod and Play Ad.

4. Observe the appearance of Overlay on video.
step.expectedresults:
1. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = start then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video from the start and toggle through the user interaction.

2. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = Delayed then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video after specified time mentioned in "OVERLAY_START_TIME" and toggle through the user interaction.

3. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = end then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video at the end of the first loop and toggle through the user interaction.

4. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = onClick then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video after user interaction on video.

5. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = Hidden then Ad Overlay should  not displayed on video even if user interact with the video.

6. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = alwaysVisible then Ad Overlay should always displayed on video and should not toggle with user interaction.

3. When INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS is set to '999', then Close button should not displayed on video.
